verses.verse: וַיֹּ֥סֶף <S%H3254><s%> also proceeded אֱלִיה֗וּא <S%H453><s%> Elihu וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

כַּתַּר־ <S%H3803><s%> Suffer לִ֣י זְ֭עֵיר <S%H2191><s%> me a little וַאֲחַוֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H2331><s%> and I will shew כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> there ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is yet לֶאֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> on God's מִלִּֽים׃ <S%H4405><s%> thee that [I have] yet to speak

אֶשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> I will fetch דֵ֭עִי <S%H1843><s%> my knowledge לְמֵרָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> from afar וּ֝לְפֹעֲלִ֗י <S%H6466><s%> to my Maker אֶֽתֵּֽן־ <S%H5414><s%> and will ascribe צֶֽדֶק׃ <S%H6664><s%> righteousness

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אָ֭מְנָם <S%H551><s%> For truly לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not שֶׁ֣קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [shall] not [be] false מִלָּ֑י <S%H4405><s%> my words תְּמִ֖ים <S%H8549><s%> he that is perfect דֵּע֣וֹת <S%H1844><s%> in knowledge עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

הֶן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> Behold God כַּ֭בִּיר <S%H3524><s%> [is] mighty וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יִמְאָ֑ס <S%H3988><s%> and despiseth כַּ֝בִּ֗יר <S%H3524><s%> not [any he is] mighty כֹּ֣חַֽ <S%H3581><s%> in strength לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> [and] wisdom

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יְחַיֶּ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> He preserveth not the life רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked וּמִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> right עֲנִיִּ֣ים <S%H6041><s%> to the poor יִתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> but giveth

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִגְרַ֥ע <S%H1639><s%> He withdraweth מִצַּדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> from the righteous עֵ֫ינָ֥יו <S%H5869><s%> not his eyes וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with מְלָכִ֥ים <S%H4428><s%> but with kings לַכִּסֵּ֑א <S%H3678><s%> [are they] on the throne וַיֹּשִׁיבֵ֥ם <S%H3427><s%> yea he doth establish לָ֝נֶ֗צַח <S%H5331><s%> them for ever וַיִּגְבָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H1361><s%> and they are exalted

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if אֲסוּרִ֥ים <S%H631><s%> And if [they be] bound בַּזִּקִּ֑ים <S%H2131><s%> in fetters יִ֝לָּכְד֗וּן <S%H3920><s%> [and] be holden בְּחַבְלֵי־ <S%H2256><s%> in cords עֹֽנִי׃ <S%H6040><s%> of affliction

וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> Then he sheweth לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> to them פָּעֳלָ֑ם <S%H6467><s%> them their work וּ֝פִשְׁעֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6588><s%> and their transgressions כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יִתְגַּבָּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1396><s%> that they have exceeded

וַיִּ֣גֶל <S%H1540><s%> He openeth אָ֭זְנָם <S%H241><s%> also their ear לַמּוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> to discipline וַ֝יֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and commandeth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יְשֻׁב֥וּן <S%H7725><s%> that they return מֵאָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> from iniquity

אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If יִשְׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> If they obey וְֽיַ֫עֲבֹ֥דוּ <S%H5647><s%> and serve יְכַלּ֣וּ <S%H3615><s%> [him] they shall spend יְמֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H3117><s%> their days בַּטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> in prosperity וּ֝שְׁנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H8141><s%> and their years בַּנְּעִימִֽים׃ <S%H5273><s%> in pleasures

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִ֭שְׁמְעוּ <S%H8085><s%> But if they obey בְּשֶׁ֣לַח <S%H7973><s%> by the sword יַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <S%H5674><s%> not they shall perish וְ֝יִגְוְע֗וּ <S%H1478><s%> and they shall die כִּבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> without דָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> without knowledge

וְֽחַנְפֵי־ <S%H2611><s%> But the hypocrites לֵ֭ב <S%H3820><s%> in heart יָשִׂ֣ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> heap up אָ֑ף <S%H639><s%> wrath לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יְ֝שַׁוְּע֗וּ <S%H7768><s%> they cry כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when אֲסָרָֽם׃ <S%H631><s%> not when he bindeth
תָּמֹ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> die בַּנֹּ֣עַר <S%H5290><s%> in youth נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> They וְ֝חַיָּתָ֗ם <S%H2416><s%> and their life בַּקְּדֵשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6945><s%> [is] among the unclean

יְחַלֵּ֣ץ <S%H2502><s%> He delivereth עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> the poor בְעָנְי֑וֹ <S%H6040><s%> in his affliction וְיִ֖גֶל <S%H1540><s%> and openeth בַּלַּ֣חַץ <S%H3906><s%> in oppression אָזְנָֽם׃ <S%H241><s%> their ears

וְאַ֤ף <S%H637><s%> indeed הֲסִיתְךָ֨ ׀ <S%H5496><s%> Even so would he have removed מִפִּי־ <S%H6310><s%> the mouth צָ֗ר <S%H6862><s%> of distress רַ֭חַב <S%H7338><s%> [into] a broad place לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no מוּצָ֣ק <S%H4164><s%> [there is] no straitness תַּחְתֶּ֑יהָ <S%H8478><s%> where וְנַ֥חַת <S%H5183><s%> and that which should be set שֻׁ֝לְחָנְךָ֗ <S%H7979><s%> on thy table מָ֣לֵא <S%H4390><s%> [should be] full דָֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1880><s%> of fatness

וְדִין־ <S%H1779><s%> the judgment רָשָׁ֥ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked מָלֵ֑אתָ <S%H4390><s%> But thou hast fulfilled דִּ֖ין <S%H1779><s%> judgment וּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> and justice יִתְמֹֽכוּ׃ <S%H8551><s%> take hold

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that חֵ֭מָה <S%H2534><s%> Because [there is] wrath פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> does not יְסִֽיתְךָ֣ <S%H5496><s%> [beware] lest he take thee away בְסָ֑פֶק <S%H5607><s%> with [his] stroke וְרָב־ <S%H7227><s%> in abundance כֹּ֝֗פֶר <S%H3724><s%> ransom אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יַטֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H5186><s%> cannot deliver

הֲיַעֲרֹ֣ךְ <S%H6186><s%> Will he esteem שׁ֭וּעֲךָ <S%H7769><s%> cry לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not בְצָ֑ר <S%H1222><s%> gold וְ֝כֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all מַאֲמַצֵּי־ <S%H3981><s%> nor all the forces כֹֽחַ׃ <S%H3581><s%> of strength

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁאַ֥ף <S%H7602><s%> Desire הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> not the night לַעֲל֖וֹת <S%H5927><s%> are cut off עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> when people תַּחְתָּֽם׃ <S%H8478><s%> their place

הִ֭שָּׁמֶר <S%H8104><s%> Take heed אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּ֣פֶן <S%H6437><s%> regard אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> not iniquity כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and זֶ֝֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this בָּחַ֥רְתָּ <S%H977><s%> for this hast thou chosen מֵעֹֽנִי׃ <S%H6040><s%> rather than affliction

הֶן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֵ֭ל <S%H410><s%> Behold God יַשְׂגִּ֣יב <S%H7682><s%> exalteth בְּכֹח֑וֹ <S%H3581><s%> by his power מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who כָמֹ֣הוּ <S%H3644><s%> like מוֹרֶֽה׃ <S%H3384><s%> who teacheth

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who פָקַ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> Who hath enjoined עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> and who אָ֝מַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> has said פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <S%H6466><s%> Thou hast wrought עַוְלָֽה׃ <S%H5766><s%> iniquity

זְ֭כֹר <S%H2142><s%> Remember כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תַשְׂגִּ֣יא <S%H7679><s%> that thou magnify פָעֳל֑וֹ <S%H6467><s%> his work אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> of which שֹׁרְר֣וּ <S%H7891><s%> behold אֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H376><s%> men
כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> Every man חָֽזוּ־ <S%H2372><s%> may see ב֑וֹ אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> it man יַבִּ֥יט <S%H5027><s%> may behold מֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <S%H7350><s%> [it] afar off

הֶן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> Behold God שַׂ֭גִּיא <S%H7689><s%> [is] great וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נֵדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> and we know מִסְפַּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> [him] not neither can the number שָׁנָ֣יו <S%H8141><s%> of his years וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> be searched חֵֽקֶר׃ <S%H2714><s%> be searched out

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> for יְגָרַ֣ע <S%H1639><s%> For he maketh small נִטְפֵי־ <S%H5198><s%> the drops מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water יָזֹ֖קּוּ <S%H2212><s%> they pour down מָטָ֣ר <S%H4306><s%> rain לְאֵדֽוֹ׃ <S%H108><s%> according to the vapour

אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which יִזְּל֥וּ <S%H5140><s%> do drop שְׁחָקִ֑ים <S%H7834><s%> Which the clouds יִ֝רְעֲפ֗וּ <S%H7491><s%> [and] distil עֲלֵ֤י ׀ <S%H5921><s%> upon אָדָ֬ם <S%H120><s%> upon man רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> abundantly

אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> yet אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יָ֭בִין <S%H995><s%> Also can [any] understand מִפְרְשֵׂי־ <S%H4666><s%> the spreadings עָ֑ב <S%H5645><s%> of the clouds תְּ֝שֻׁא֗וֹת <S%H8663><s%> [or] the noise סֻכָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5521><s%> booth

הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold פָּרַ֣שׂ <S%H6566><s%> Behold he spreadeth עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> about אוֹר֑וֹ <S%H216><s%> his light וְשָׁרְשֵׁ֖י <S%H8328><s%> the bottom הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea כִּסָּֽה׃ <S%H3680><s%> upon it and covereth

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֭ם יָדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> For by them judgeth עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> he the people יִֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> he giveth אֹ֥כֶל <S%H400><s%> meat לְמַכְבִּֽיר׃ <S%H4342><s%> in abundance

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּפַּ֥יִם <S%H3709><s%> With clouds כִּסָּה־ <S%H3680><s%> he covereth א֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> the light וַיְצַ֖ו <S%H6680><s%> and commandeth עָלֶ֣יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and בְמַפְגִּֽיעַ׃ <S%H6293><s%> it [not to shine] by [the cloud] that cometh betwixt

יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> thereof sheweth עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> his presence רֵע֑וֹ <S%H7452><s%> The noise מִ֝קְנֶ֗ה <S%H4735><s%> concerning it the cattle אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> also עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning עוֹלֶֽה׃ <S%H5927><s%> also concerning the vapour
